summary: Verified TradeCommand consolidation: 6 overlapping alert systems reduced to 2 clean systems. TradeSignals replaces LiveAlertsPanel on Trading tab. Alerts/Opportunities sections removed from AI Coach. Alerts & Intel panel removed from Analytics. All tabs work correctly.
passed_tests: Trading tab: TradeSignals component visible with data-testid='trade-signals'
Trading tab: TradeSignals header shows 'Trade Signals' label
Trading tab: TradeSignals shows scan count and signal count (0 scans | 0 signals)
Trading tab: TradeSignals has settings gear button
Trading tab: TradeSignals shows expand/collapse chevron icons
Trading tab: TradeSignals shows empty state outside market hours
AI Coach tab: Bot Trades section present
AI Coach tab: Search Ticker section present
AI Coach tab: Portfolio section present
AI Coach tab: Market Indices section present
AI Coach tab: Earnings section present
AI Coach tab: No dedicated 'Alerts' section (removed as expected)
AI Coach tab: No 'Opportunities' section (removed as expected)
Analytics tab: Learning Loop/Dashboard present
Analytics tab: Scanner section present
Analytics tab: No 'Alerts & Intel' panel (removed as expected)
Analytics tab: No 'Enhanced Alerts' section (removed as expected)
Tab switching: Trading ↔ AI Coach ↔ Analytics works correctly
Header: Positions dropdown opens correctly
Header: Alerts dropdown opens correctly
Backend: GET /api/live-scanner/status returns 200 with scan info
Backend: GET /api/live-scanner/alerts returns 200 with empty alerts array
critical_code_review_comments: TradeSignals.jsx correctly connects to SSE endpoint /api/live-scanner/stream-alerts
TradeSignals properly handles empty state with 'No signals yet' message
AICommandPanel.jsx has been cleaned up - no Alerts or Opportunities sections
CommandCenterPage.js correctly imports TradeSignals instead of LiveAlertsPanel
Analytics tab only shows Learning Dashboard + Scanner as expected

success_rate.backend: 100% - SSE endpoint and alerts API working

context_for_next_testing_agent: Consolidation complete. Trading tab shows TradeSignals (compact unified feed). AI Coach shows Bot Trades, Search, Portfolio, Market Indices, Earnings, Watchlist, Scanner Results. Analytics shows Learning Loop + Scanner only. LiveAlertsPanel file still exists but is not imported/used anywhere.

before: Alerts & Intel panel in Analytics tab
after: TradeSignals component on Trading tab (unified real-time feed)
Scanner section (manual IB scan) in Analytics tab
Clean AI Coach with Bot Trades, Portfolio, Market data only

components_verified.TradeSignals: New compact signal component with SSE, header with label/counts/gear/chevron
components_verified.AICommandPanel: Cleaned - Bot Trades, Search, Portfolio, Market Indices, Earnings, Watchlist, Scanner Results
components_verified.CommandCenterPage: Updated - Trading tab uses TradeSignals, Analytics has Learning+Scanner only
